sense.def:
Z besedo
all
povemo, da se povedano nanaša na vso skupino ali na celoten predmet.

seg.quote: All the girls think it's great.
They carried all the stuff into the hall.
All of the defendants were proved guilty.
All was quiet in the gaol.

sense.def:
Z besedo
all
tudi poudarimo obseg, v katerem se nekaj zgodi ali za katerega nekaj velja.

seg.quote: He spilled coffee all over himself.

sense.def:
Besedo
all
uporabimo, kadar govorimo o neodločenem izidu igre. Na primer: kadar je izid
three all
imata oba igralca po tri točke.

Z izrazom
above all
poudarimo, da je neka stvar pomembnejša od druge.

seg.quote: Relax, and above all don't panic.

sense.def:
Izraz
after all
uporabimo, kadar želimo opozoriti na nekaj, kar so drugi morda pozabili ali česar prej nismo opazili.

seg.quote: Could it be true, after all, that money did not bring happiness?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
all in all
uvedemo povzetek ali posplošitev.

seg.quote: All in all, I'm not in favour.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj ni
all that good
ali
all that important
želimo povedati, da ni zelo dobro ali pomembno;

seg.quote: I don't know him all that well.

sense.def:
All the more
ali
all the better
pomeni veliko več ali bolje kakor prej.

seg.quote: You must work all the more quickly now.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
at all
poudarimo nikalnico ali vprašanje.

seg.quote: We didn't go there at all.
Haven't you got any at all?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
for all
povemo, da določeno dejstvo ne vpliva na tisto ali ne nasprotuje tistemu, kar pripovedujemo, čeprav vemo, da je videti drugače.

seg.quote: For all her sensitivity, she's extremely tough.

sense.def:
Z izrazoma
in all seriousness
ali
in all honesty
poudarimo, da mislimo povsem resno ali odkrito.

seg.quote: I say this in all seriousness.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
of all
poudarimo besedi
first
ali
last
prislov, ali pa presežnik pridevnika.

seg.quote: I asked them first of all if they were Welsh.
This view is the best of all.
